name: NSFileProviderEnumerator
desc: A protocol for enumerating items and changes.

items.name: func enumerateItems(for: NSFileProviderEnumerationObserver, startingAt: NSFileProviderPage)
items.desc: Requests the next batch of items, starting at the specified page.

items.name: func enumerateChanges(for: NSFileProviderChangeObserver, from: NSFileProviderSyncAnchor)
items.desc: Requests the next batch of changes after the specified sync anchor.

items.name: func invalidate()
items.desc: Stops the enumeration of items and changes.
